fish.name: Bluegill
fish.alt: Bluegill - a small fish and the first one to get a sprite.
fish.flavor: bluegills are a pretty common fish.

fish.name: pumpkinseed
fish.alt: Pumpkinseed - this is literally a bluegill reskin
fish.flavor: pumpkinseeds are apparently "pumpkin seed shaped", but this one looks pretty fish shaped. Maybe there's a more pumpkind seed shaped one out there.
